column1: Advanced Mechanical Engineering with Materials MSc
column5: This course is aimed at those who wish to study advanced topics in mechanical engineering with a focus on materials.It provides an in-depth technical understanding of advanced mechanical engineering topics. You'll also gain generic skills in order to contribute effectively in developing company capabilities.The course is designed to make you more employable and also satisfies the Further Learning requirements necessary to obtain Chartered Engineer status.This course is particularly suitable for graduate engineers in the following sectors:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 12 months full-time; up to 36 months part-time (September start only)
